name: Hunter/Hunded
description:
Hunter/Hunded is an entry for the Gamejams:

One Script Jam 2021 by Sarrixx
ZenoJam-The perfect jam for beginners by Zeno

You play as a Soldier sent out to hunt down a very dangerous Monster.

The list of Controlls is short:
WASD to Move
SPACE to swing a spear
The rest is done using the mouse.
